mean_cn: adj. 顺利的；走运的；手头宽裕的；繁荣昌盛的

sentence: Our campus was very multi-cultural, with students from all over the world.

sentence: I think mushrooms are delicious.

sentence: It's good to be cautious and use your seat belt.

sentence: She is very friendly and outgoing.

sentence_tra: 印第安人是美国唯一的土著人。

sentence: I can take my laptop with me anywhere.
sentence_tra: 我可以随处带着我的笔记本电脑。

sentence: I recognized a passer-by on the street.
sentence_tra: 我在街上认出了一个路人。

sentence: I boil water in my kettle to make tea.
sentence_tra: 我用水壶烧水来泡茶。

sentence: Latin was the language of the ancient Roman Empire.
sentence_tra: 拉丁语是古代罗马帝国的语言。

mean_cn: n. 翻译;  译本;  转变;  调任;
sentence: I'm looking for a good translation of some  Chinese poems.
sentence_tra: 我在寻找一些翻译得较好的中文诗。

sentence: Stop being so noisy; you're hurting my ears!
sentence_tra: 不要吵了！你在摧残我的耳朵！

sentence: Beautiful flowers were kept in the red vase.
sentence_tra: 红色的花瓶中插着漂亮的花。

sentence: The students were happy to get new textbooks.
sentence_tra: 学生们拿到新的课本很开心。

mean_cn: n.(英)甜面包；(美)小甜饼；饼干
sentence: There are six different types of cookies.
sentence_tra: 这儿有六种不同的曲奇。

mean_cn: adj. 有关的; 关切的, 担心的;
sentence: Mark looks concerned with his work.
sentence_tra: Mark看起来很担心他的工作。

sentence: I'm puzzled about why I spend so much money.
sentence_tra: 我很困惑为什么我花了这么多的钱。

sentence: Please pay me with cash.
sentence_tra: 请用现金支付。

mean_cn: v. 接触；联系n. 接触；联系
sentence: Please contact me by phone or email.
sentence_tra: 请通过电话或电子邮件与我联系。

sentence: It's a bird sitting on a wire.
sentence_tra: 鸟站在电线上。

sentence: I think she's greedy--all she cares about is money.
sentence_tra: 我觉得她很贪婪，她只在乎钱。

sentence: The plants emerge from the soil.
sentence_tra: 植物破土而出。

sentence: At present I'm free, but I have a meeting in ten minutes.
sentence_tra: 目前我有空，但十分钟后有个会议。

sentence: The economy is improving and people have more money.
sentence_tra: 经济正在改善，人们也有了更多的钱。

mean_cn: n. 关心，担忧v. 感兴趣；涉及；使担忧
sentence: She shows her concern by helping me walk.
sentence_tra: 她通过帮助我走路来表达她的关心。

sentence: I took a long bath after a tough day at work.
sentence_tra: 经过一天艰难的工作后我洗了很长时间的澡。

sentence: He wore a hat made of leather.
sentence_tra: 他戴着一个皮帽子。

sentence: When I grow up I want to be a businessman, for the money.
sentence_tra: 等我长大我想成为商人，因为可以赚很多钱。

sentence: When I camp in the mountains, I always wear hiking boots.
sentence_tra: 当我在山上露营时，我总是穿登山鞋。

sentence: I hate being out of work, especially because I loved my old job.
sentence_tra: 我讨厌失业，尤其因为我很喜欢以前那份工作。

sentence: Can you put the vegetables in the refrigerator?
sentence_tra: 麻烦把蔬菜放在冰箱里，好吗？

sentence: My utility vest is useful at work because it can hold all of my tools.
sentence_tra: 我的实用背心在工作时很有用，因为它能装很多工具。

mean_cn: adj.意识到的，知道的，警惕的
sentence: The dog is alert and aware.
sentence_tra: 这只狗很警觉。

sentence: When you're done with the stove, make sure to turn it off.
sentence_tra: 用完电炉以后记得关掉。

sentence: The family had an enjoyable afternoon together.
sentence_tra: 这家人度过了一个愉快的下午。

sentence: I'm so ashamed; don't even look at me!
sentence_tra: 我感觉很羞愧,别看着我！

mean_cn: n.传真(机)；传真件v.用传真传输
sentence: Send me the form via fax.
sentence_tra: 用传真机把这个表格发给我。

sentence: Tipping your king over is the symbol of defeat in Western chess.
sentence_tra: 推倒你的国王在国际象棋中是胜利的象征。

sentence: Her clothing grabbed our attention.
sentence_tra: 她的衣服吸引了我们的注意力。

sentence: The rock was cut by erosion over millions of years.
sentence_tra: 这岩石是被几百万年的腐蚀切割而成。

sentence: His job is to give away samples of our products for people to try.
sentence_tra: 他的工作就是分发我们的产品样品给人们体验。

sentence: I'm good at relaxing in my armchair - I practice a lot.
sentence_tra: 我常常在扶手椅上休息―我经常这样做。

sentence: Pi is approximately equal to 3.1415.
sentence_tra: 圆周率大约等于3.1415。

mean_cn: n.戴在头上的收话器, 双耳式耳机
sentence: Let me teach you how to use headphones to listen to music in class.
sentence_tra: 让我教你怎么在课堂上用耳机听音乐。

mean_cn: n. 闪光;  刹那;  vi. 闪光;  发火花;  adj. 炫耀的;  浮夸的;  一闪而过的;  vt. 闪, 闪烁;
sentence: The lightning struck with a flash of light.
sentence_tra: 闪电击出闪光。

sentence: He must truly love you if he gave you flowers.
sentence_tra: 如果他送你花就证明他一定真的爱上你了。

sentence: The salesgirl looks young.
sentence_tra: 那女售货员看起来很年轻。

sentence: This science seems to be too advanced for him!
sentence_tra: 看起来科学对他来说太难（高级）了。

sentence: They were both determined to win the race.
sentence_tra: 他们都决心赢得比赛。

mean_cn: adj.罗马的，罗马文字的，罗马人的n.罗马人
sentence: These are the ruins of a two-thousand-year-old Roman building.
sentence_tra: 这些是两千年前的罗马建筑遗迹。

mean_cn: vi. 变稳固;  变坚实;  adj. 牢固的;  坚定的;  vt. 使牢固, 使稳固;  adv. 稳固地; n. 公司; 商号;
sentence: The lawyers decided to create their own firm.
sentence_tra: 这些律师决定创立自己的事务所。

mean_cn: n. 合同;  交易;  便宜货;  vi. 讨价还价, 讲价;  成交;  adj. (价格), 低廉的;  vt. 经讨价还价成交;  用…交换;
sentence: The old lady is trying to bargain with the peddler.
sentence_tra: 老婆婆正试图和小贩讲价。

sentence: We sell a range of products for skincare and health.
sentence_tra: 我们卖一系列护肤和保健产品。

mean_cn: vt. 迷住, 使着迷, 使烦扰;
sentence: Why does she obsess about her shoes like that?
sentence_tra: 她为什么那样痴迷于她的鞋？

sentence: He's trying to earn money for a trip to New York this summer.
sentence_tra: 他在为这个夏天去纽约的旅行努力挣钱。

mean_cn: n. 宽松工作服; 女衬衫; 短上衣;  vi. 宽松下垂;  vt. 使…宽松下垂使松垂;
sentence: Where did you get that blouse?! I want to buy one for myself.
sentence_tra: 你从哪买到的那件女士衬衫？我想给自己买一件。

sentence: The salesman told us the details about the house for sale.
sentence_tra: 那个销售员告诉我们关于在售房屋的细节。

sentence: I will determine which option is better.
sentence_tra: 我将决定哪一个选项更好。
